First Line: JEANNE:     Now you know my story.        #LINEID: 00100
JEANNE:     Now you know my story.        #LINEID: 00100
JEANNE:     All I did was lie my way out of trouble and make things worse.        #LINEID: 00500
JEANNE:     I was stubborn
NORMALMAIKAN:     I kept hoping this one fur would fix EVERYTHING the white men did.     #LINEID: 00300
NORMALMAIKAN:     I used to think appeasing the spirit's anger was all that really mattered.     #LINEID: 00300
JEANNE:     Honestly? It felt like I *had* to.      #LINEID: 00100
JEANNE:     Just because reading it got me into trouble doesn't mean I wanted it gone.      #LINEID: 00100
JEANNE:     ...But it didn't matter. No matter how loud I cried
JEANNE:     ...But I wish I could have heard Him answer. Just once.      #LINEID: 00100
JEANNE:     If I tried hard enough
Condition: I could *make* life better. For everyone.      #LINEID: 00400

First Line: JEANNE:     If I was smart about it
Condition: I'd *thrive* in ways I never could in Europe.     #LINEID: 00400

First Line: JEANNE:     ...But I don't know if I have any of that old faith left.       #LINEID: 00600
JEANNE:     ...Some say God has a plan for those who believe in Him.       #LINEID: 00600
NORMALMAIKAN:     I did what I could. But I couldn't help a man who wouldn't meet me halfway.      #LINEID: 00200
NORMALMAIKAN:     Tehonwastasta said men in black robes were beyond understanding. And he was right.       #LINEID: 00200
NORMALMAIKAN:     Even HE must have known things would turn out this way
NORMALMAIKAN:     Part of me believes Tehonwastasta was right
Condition: when he said the man deserved death.       #LINEID: 00200

First Line: JEANNE:     Yet even MORE people may have died because I disobeyed.      #LINEID: 00500
JEANNE:     ...No. No
Condition: I was GOING to kill people because of him.       #LINEID: 00500

First Line: JEANNE:     He told me
Condition: over and over. THIS is what God wants. THIS is how we make the New World safe.       #LINEID: 00600

First Line: JEANNE:     I couldn't just sit there and let Tehon suffer
JEANNE:     Out there? I stayed true to my principles
Condition: no matter what. Never wavered. Never asked *why.*      #LINEID: 01000

First Line: JEANNE:     His interpretation of God's will was warped beyond recognition. But mine was too.        #LINEID: 01000
JEANNE:     I was as unflinching as he was. And Capitaine... Capitaine DIED because of it.     #LINEID: 01100
JEANNE:     But I was only using God as an excuse
Condition: to make deceit seem virtuous. Just like Augustin.       #LINEID: 01100

First Line: JEANNE:     And I was too obstinate to realize how far I strayed until it was too late.       #LINEID: 01100
JEANNE:     I lied
column5: rejected doctrine... Used God as a tool. And people DIED for it.      #LINEID: 01100

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     ...But I know how crushing it is
Condition: when you realize you've failed to live up to them.       #LINEID: 00200

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     ...But I know how hard it can be to stay true to them
Condition: when they're put to the test.        #LINEID: 00200

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     And I'm sure more outsiders will use that justification again
NORMALMAIKAN:     And I can't deny resenting you for doing the same. No matter your reasons
NORMALMAIKAN:     They make you... Quick to judge things. For better AND for worse.       #LINEID: 00400
NORMALMAIKAN:     They can... Color your way of thinking. Limit your outlook.      #LINEID: 00400
NORMALMAIKAN:     It's the reason Tehonwastasta says he'd rather struggle doing something than suffer doing nothing.        #LINEID: 00700
NORMALMAIKAN:     Because giving up on the Innu would be like... Giving up on everything that makes me who I am.     #LINEID: 00700
NORMALMAIKAN:     You showed respect to a Wendat man
NORMALMAIKAN:     You found purpose in trying to build lasting peace with people in need.      #LINEID: 00600
NORMALMAIKAN:     Because if we're consumed by BLIND devotion
Condition: and refuse to see truths right in front of us...     #LINEID: 01200

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     Because if we try to bend reality to our wills
Condition: until it fits what we THINK is righteous...        #LINEID: 01200

First Line: //Regardless of his crimes
//Nuns at the convent said sinners were to be cleansed of evil in purgatory.       #LINEID: 00200
//Regardless of his crimes
//Nuns at the convent said sinners were to be cleansed of evil in purgatory.       #LINEID: 00200
NORMALMAIKAN:     I know the French aren't monsters. They have principles
Condition: and reasons for doing what they do.       #LINEID: 00300

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     I *tried* to learn more about your people. To make sense of your wants and actions.        #LINEID: 00300
NORMALMAIKAN:     There are exceptions
Condition: obviously. Though they're few and far between.       #LINEID: 00600

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     ...Though maybe *I'm* the reason things feel that way.      #LINEID: 00600
NORMALMAIKAN:     There are exceptions
Condition: obviously. Though they're few and far between.       #LINEID: 00600

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     ...Though maybe *I'm* the reason things feel that way.      #LINEID: 00600
NORMALMAIKAN:     I should be back home. Preparing for winter Caribou hunts. Living like an Innu *should* live.       #LINEID: 00900
NORMALMAIKAN:     I know there's nothing I can do about it. That I should be focusing on the future
JEANNE:     I know it might seem hard to believe
JEANNE:     Maybe I have no right to say this after what I've done to them...       #LINEID: 00100
NORMALMAIKAN:     Plus
Condition: even with people like Pierre on our side...      #LINEID: 00900

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     Plus
Condition: with people like Pierre and Augustin around...      #LINEID: 00900

First Line: JEANNE:     No matter his mistakes
column5: you kept believing Pierre could be better.         #LINEID: 00100

First Line: JEANNE:     Regardless of your differences
Condition: or how things ended between you...      #LINEID: 00100

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     Because Pierre is just one person. And an exceptional one at that.      #LINEID: 00500
NORMALMAIKAN:     Because Pierre is proof they can change *us* too. And not always for the better.       #LINEID: 00500
NORMALMAIKAN:     Because I can't fix a person who doesn't WANT to change.       #LINEID: 00500
NORMALMAIKAN:     ...I don't hate Pierre. I don't even think he's a *bad* person. If anything
NORMALMAIKAN:     And for all I know? There's a chance NOTHING I did ever really got through to him.     #LINEID: 00600
NORMALMAIKAN:     ...And I could keep pretending things will stay the same.    #LINEID: 01300
NORMALMAIKAN:     ...And I could keep believing good intentions are enough.     #LINEID: 01300
JEANNE:     Now you know my story.        #LINEID: 00100
JEANNE:     You said you were like Tehon. That you'd rather struggle doing this than suffer doing nothing.     #LINEID: 00100
JEANNE:     You said doing nothing to help the Innu would like be betraying them. Betraying who you are.     #LINEID: 00100
JEANNE:     You said your people's values
Condition: and your love for this land... They're IMPOSSIBLE to cast aside.     #LINEID: 00100

First Line: JEANNE:     Your people didn't make it this far by giving up. And neither did we.     #LINEID: 00600
JEANNE:     Be cunning. Be resourceful. And be the person your people NEED you to be.       #LINEID: 00600
JEANNE:     I'm not exactly sure how I'll keep *my* promise and pay him properly
NORMALMAIKAN:     Surprised he didn't call that bluff you made to blackmail him.      #LINEID: 00300
JEANNE:     It pays to be a good liar sometimes.     #LINEID: 00400
JEANNE:     Well... He might
Condition: eventually. But I'll deal with that *if* it happens.      #LINEID: 00400

First Line: NORMALMAIKAN:     ...I know there'll be *something* I can do out there. And I'll find it.        #LINEID: 01000
NORMALMAIKAN:     ...I won't let that stop me from keeping the Innu safe. Not *ever* again.      #LINEID: 01000
JEANNE:     I know you'll use it to set things right
Condition: no matter what comes your way next.        #LINEID: 01300

First Line: JEANNE:     You can... Consider it thanks. For reminding me not to give up on myself.       #LINEID: 01300
NORMALMAIKAN:     So... Promise me you won't give up out there either
NORMALMAIKAN:     So... Promise me you won't be afraid of change either
